column1: Art Institute of Chicago////This place is MASSIVE!! From the outside
column2: I had no idea how big it was!! You could probably spend a week on here and still miss some of the art. Note: they loan art out to other museums
column3: and they change the art up. We had a couple pieces we wanted to see but one was in NYC and the other is temporarily off exhibit so other pieces can be displayed. Whatever your art pleasure is... sculpture
